sentences.sContent: Long believed to exist only in the brains of humans and other great apes, in 2006 spindle cells were discovered in the same brain areas in humpback whales, fin whales, killer whales, and sperm whales.
sentences.sContent_eng: Long believed to exist only in the brains of humans and other great apes, in 2006 spindle cells were discovered in the same brain areas in humpback whales, fin whales, killer whales, and sperm whales.
sentences.sCn: 长久以来梭形细胞被认为只存在于人类和其他类人猿的大脑中，直到2006梭形细胞也在座头鲸、长须鲸、虎鲸和抹香鲸大脑的同样区域上被发现。

synos.tran: 轴；[细胞]纺锤，[纺]锭子；细长的人或物

phrases.pCn: 梭形细胞；纺锤细胞；纺锤形细胞

trans.tranCn: 轴；纺锤，锭子；细长的人或物
trans.tranOther: a part of a machine shaped like a stick, around which something turns

trans.tranCn: 锭子的，锭子似的；细长的
